title: Modifying the ExternalIndex
description: This sample demonstrates how to modify the default ExternalIndex Examine index.

title: Exact-matching multiple strings when searching with Examine
description: Searching for exact strings in Examine can be a little counter-intuitive. Couple that with the confusion of multiple values (potentially using the Repeatable text strings or tag data types) and inconsistencies between the backoffice tooling and the fluent API and you've got a right potential mess on your hands!

title: Umbraco AngularJS filter cheat sheet
description: In Umbraco v13 and below, the Block editors (list and grid), Nested Content and custom list views allow you to customise how the summarized/collapsed items appear using AngularJS templates and filters - you're not just stuck with the default!

title: Migrating Rich Text Editor Macros to Blocks using uSync Migrations
description: Modern Umbraco allows Blocks to be added inline in the Rich Text Editor. Umbraco 14 removes support for macros. This code sample will map macros to blocks with the help of uSync Migrations.
